message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this incredible product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $1,100,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the market value, but this product offers unique advantages that justify a higher price. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,050,000.  This is a very competitive offer for a product of this caliber.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $950,000. I believe that's a fair price for this product.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I've tried to find a price that reflects the true value of this product while also being fair to you.  I'm willing to accept $1,000,000.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $980,000. I believe that's a fair price for this product.
